item.title: Satellite Oceanographic Data made easier in R
item.description: A Brief Overview The amount of data being generated by satellites has soared in recent years. The proliferation of remote sensing data can be explained by recent advancements in satellite technologies. However, according to Febvre1, this advancement set another challenge of handling and processing pentabyte of data satellite generates. Thanks to ERDDAP, for being in frontline to overcome this challenge. We can obtain satellite data within the geographical extent of the area we are interested.
